title: Justin Sun says HTX and Poloniex will offer ‘epic airdrop’ following exchange hacks
description:
Justin Sun, a top representative for the crypto exchanges HTX and Poloniex, announced plans to reward users and cover losses on Nov. 24. In a statement on X, Sun wrote: “As HTX and Poloniex approach opening deposit and withdrawal, we will initiate an epic airdrop for users with assets. Please stay tuned! My deepest apologies […]

The post Justin Sun says HTX and Poloniex will offer ‘epic airdrop’ following exchange hacks appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Solana’s Market Movements: Debunking the Head and Shoulders Myth
description: Market analysts scrutinize Solana’s (SOL) price chart, questioning the presence of a ‘Head and Shoulders’ (H&S) pattern, typically indicative of a bearish turn. Current trends on Solana’s chart do not exhibit the traditional H&S pattern, instead showing a consistent upward trajectory with regular corrections. Understanding Solana’s Price Dynamics As the cryptocurrency market continues to evolve, [...]
